Get Future Data Building Block

Source: R/calcDriver.R
calcFutureData.Rd

Get Future Data Building Block

Usage

calcFutureData(driver, futureData, unit)

Arguments

driver

A string designating the driver. Available drivers are:

  • GDP

  • Population

  • GDPpc

  • Labour

  • Urban

futureData

A string passed to the calc'Driver'Future function, e.g. calcGDPFuture() or calcPopulationFuture().

Value

magpie object with the requested output data either on country or on regional level depending on the choice of argument "aggregate" or a list of information if supplementary is set to TRUE.

See also

  • calcGDPPast(), calcGDPFuture(), calcGDPpcPast() and calcGDPpcFuture() for the builiding blocks of the GDP and GDPpc scenarios.

  • calcPopulationPast(), calcPopulationFuture(), calcLabourPast(), calcLabourFuture(), calcUrbanPast() and calcUrbanFuture() for the builiding blocks of the Population, Labor and Urban scenarios.
